content: simple towel topper has been designed for those new to crocheting the tops of towels there are several ways you can prepare a towel for a crocheted top but for this pattern i have used the embroidery chain stitch as it gives a cleaner finish you can use blanket stitch or if you have a sharp steel hook you can crochet into the top the pattern calls for 37 stitches across the center to achieve this it will be 1 stitch per 1cm this will make to top to gather if you have a specific pattern question please pop on over to my ravelry group buttonnose crochet community /groups/buttonnose-crochet-community c buttonnose crochet for pattern help please contact me via my facebook page 1 1 https //www facebook com/buttonnosecrochet/
